message: Let's be fair and split the money. This is a good deal for both of us.
I understand you want a fair deal, but the value decreases over time. This offer gives me a slight advantage to account for future rounds.
Bob, time is money! Let's settle this now. This offer is better than what you'll get in further rounds.
Alice, we both lose if we drag this out. This is my final offer above a 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats our profits!
